body:
Nvidia version:
`cat /proc/driver/nvidia/version`

`NVRM version: NVIDIA UNIX x86_64 Kernel Module  352.63  Sat Nov  7 21:25:42 PST 2015`
`GCC version:  gcc version 5.2.1 20151010 (Ubuntu 5.2.1-22ubuntu2)`

CUDA complier version:
`nvcc -V`

`nvcc: NVIDIA (R) Cuda compiler driver`
`Copyright (c) 2005-2015 NVIDIA Corporation`
`Built on Mon_Feb_16_22:59:02_CST_2015`
`Cuda compilation tools, release 7.0, V7.0.27`

`./deviceQuery`

`./deviceQuery Starting...`
`CUDA Device Query (Runtime API) version (CUDART static linking)`
 `Detected 1 CUDA Capable device(s)`

`Device 0: "Quadro K2200"`
  `CUDA Driver Version / Runtime Version          7.5 / 7.0`
  `CUDA Capability Major/Minor version number:    5.0`
...
`deviceQuery, CUDA Driver = CUDART, CUDA Driver Version = 7.5, CUDA Runtime Version = 7.0, NumDevs = 1, Device0 = Quadro K2200`
`Result = PASS`

Gtk version:
`Gtk._version
3.0`
